document_data.caption: An (inaccurate) portrait of Baron Hardisty.<ref group="note" name="appearance">[[Todd Lockwood]]'s illustration of Baron Hardisty in the ''[[Villains' Lorebook]]'' incorrectly shows him with a goatee, while the primary source, ''[[War in Tethyr]]'' explicitly describes Hardisty as having been clean-shaven. Lockwood's drawing also does not show Hardisty with the square-cut hair that both sources agree he had.
document_data.name: Faneuil Hardisty
document_data.mainbody:
'''Baron Faneuil Hardisty''' was a warrior of [[Tethyr]] who attempted to bring an end to the anarchy within the region by any means available to him.
{{TOC limit|3}}
document_data.Description: Baron Hardisty was handsome, with brown eyes and square-cut, graying hair. He kept his face clean-shaven.<ref group="note" name="appearance" />
document_data.History: Along with [[Zaranda Star]], Faneuil was a captain in [[Azoun IV|King Azoun's]] crusade against the [[Tuigan Horde]]. They met again later when he became the most prominent member of the [[City Council of Zazesspur|Council of Lords]]. Faneuil sought to restore the order within Tethyr by placing himself on the nation's throne. As it turned out, he was being used as a pawn by a creature known as the [[deepspawn]]. Allied with the Lords' Council and the bureaucracies of [[Zazesspur]], Faneuil crowned himself king and became prey for the deepspawn.
